tools/maxStress.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00037 /**
00038  * \file maxStress.c
00039  * \brief Report regions of maximum stress, either in compression or tension.
00040  *
00041  * $Source: /usr/local/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/maxStress.c,v $
00042  * $Revision: 1.7 $ 
00043  * $Date: 2007/04/04 01:07:14 $
00044  *
00045  * \description
00046  *    Usage: maxStress [options] dataset [mesh_name]
00047  *
00048  *  Report the minimum and maximum Von Mises stress in regions in compression
00049  *  and in regions of tension. Also those max and min normalized to the
00050  *  max stress over time on a per mesh basis. Regions in compression are regions
00051  *  where the pressure is less than 0 and regions in tension are regions where the
00052  *  pressure is greater than 0. The Von Mises stress and the pressure are computed
00053  *  from the symmetric stress tensor.
00054  *
00055  *  WARNING: Right now assumes that the stress tensor (symmetric) will
00056  *  be read in as separate one-component variables named: sigma-xx,
00057  *  sigma-yy, sigma-zz, sigma-xy, sigma-yz, sigma-zx.
00058  *
00059  * \modifications
00060  *   - 08/08/2006 WSD Created.
00061  *   - 03/13/2007 ACG not a modification, but the innards wrt creation of the stress and pressure
00062  *                variables have been duplicated into varNormalize. If you make a change in either
00063  *                file please cross reference.
00064  *   - 04/02/2007 ACG normalization added
00065  */
00066 
00067 #include <string.h>
00068 #include <math.h>
00069 #include "fc.h"
00070 
00071 // the endings of the sigma matrix in the order we plan to process them
00072 static char sigmaPostfix[6][3] = { "xx", "yy", "zz", "xy", "yz", "zx" };
00073 
00074 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00075   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00076   int i, j, k;
00077   int numMesh = 0, numStep;
00078   FC_Dataset ds;
00079   FC_Sequence sequence;
00080   FC_Mesh *meshes;
00081   char* file_name = NULL;
00082   char** mesh_names = NULL;
00083   FC_VerbosityLevel verbose_level = FC_QUIET;
00084   int firstt = 1, firstc = 1;
00085   double max_cmax, max_tmax, min_cmin, min_tmin;
00086   int cminMeshID, tminMeshID, cmaxMeshID, tmaxMeshID;
00087   int cminStepID, tminStepID, cmaxStepID, tmaxStepID;
00088   FC_Variable **sigmas[6]; // index as sigmas[compID][meshID][stepID]
00089 
00090   // handle arguments
00091   if (argc < 2) {
00092   usage:
00093     printf("usage: %s [options] dataset [mesh_name]\n", argv[0]);
00094     printf("options: \n");
00095     printf("   -h            : print this help message\n");
00096     printf("   -v            : print warning and error messages\n");   
00097     printf("   -V            : print log and error messages\n");   
00098     printf("\n");
00099     printf("UPDATE ME\n");
00100     fflush(NULL);
00101     exit(-1);
00102   }
00103   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00104     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-v")) {
00105       verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES;
00106     }
00107     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-V")) {
00108       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;
00109     }
00110     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2) || !strncmp(argv[i], "-", 1))
00111       goto usage;
00112     else {
00113       file_name = argv[i];
00114       // optional mesh names
00115       for (j = i+1; j < argc; j++) {
00116      void* tmp;
00117      if (!strncmp(argv[j], "-", 1))
00118        break;
00119      tmp = (char**)realloc(mesh_names, (numMesh+1)*sizeof(char*));
00120      if (!tmp)
00121        fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00122      mesh_names = tmp;
00123      mesh_names[numMesh] = (char*)malloc((strlen(argv[j])+1)*sizeof(char));
00124      strcpy(mesh_names[numMesh], argv[j]);
00125      numMesh++;
00126      i++;
00127       }
00128     }
00129   }
00130   if (!file_name)
00131     goto usage;
00132 
00133   // init library
00134   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);
00135   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00136   rc = fc_initLibrary();
00137   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00138 
00139   // load dataset
00140   rc = fc_loadDataset(file_name, &ds);
00141   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to load dataset '%s'", file_name);
00142 
00143   // Get meshes
00144   if (numMesh > 0) {
00145     meshes = (FC_Mesh*)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Mesh));
00146     if (!meshes) 
00147       fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00148     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00149       FC_Mesh *returnMeshes;
00150       int numReturnMeshes;
00151 
00152       rc = fc_getMeshByName(ds, mesh_names[i], &numReturnMeshes,
00153                  &returnMeshes);
00154       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to get mesh by name");
00155       if (numReturnMeshes != 1){
00156      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_INPUT_ERROR,
00157                     "Problems finding (unique) mesh '%s' - found %d matches",
00158                     mesh_names[i],numReturnMeshes);
00159       }
00160       meshes[i] = returnMeshes[0];
00161       free(returnMeshes);
00162     }
00163   }
00164   else {
00165     rc = fc_getMeshes(ds, &numMesh, &meshes);
00166     fc_exitIfError(rc);
00167     mesh_names = (char**)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(char*));
00168     if (!mesh_names) {
00169       fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00170     }
00171     for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00172       rc = fc_getMeshName(meshes[i], &mesh_names[i]);
00173       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00174     }
00175   }
00176 
00177   // get the variables
00178   // FIX? check that numStep is the same?
00179   for (i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
00180     char charBuf[1028];
00181     sprintf(charBuf, "sigma-%s", sigmaPostfix[i]);
00182     sigmas[i] = (FC_Variable**)malloc(numMesh*sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00183     if (!sigmas[i])
00184       fc_exitIfError(FC_MEMORY_ERROR);
00185     for (j = 0; j < numMesh; j++) {
00186       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[j], charBuf,
00187                                  &numStep,
00188                                  &sigmas[i][j]);
00189       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Could not find variable '%s' on mesh '%s'",
00190                   charBuf, mesh_names[j]);
00191       if (!sigmas[i][j]){
00192      fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(FC_INPUT_ERROR,
00193                     "Problems finding (unique) variable '%s' on mesh '%s'",
00194                     charBuf, mesh_names[j]);
00195       }
00196     }
00197   }
00198   rc = fc_getSequenceFromSeqVariable(numStep, sigmas[0][0], &sequence);
00199   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to get sequence from first seq variable");
00200 
00201   // header
00202   printf("Maximum stresses for dataset '%s'\n", file_name);
00203   fflush(NULL);
00204   if (numMesh < 0) {
00205     printf("No meshes were found\n");
00206     fflush(NULL);
00207     exit(0);
00208   }
00209   else 
00210     printf("%d meshes\n", numMesh);
00211   fflush(NULL);
00212 
00213   // loop over meshes
00214   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00215     FC_Variable stress[numStep], pressure[numStep];
00216     // FC_Variable *temp_seqVar; // for debuggin
00217     FC_Subset tense, compress;
00218     int tmin_id, tmax_id;
00219     double tmin, tmax;
00220     int cmin_id, cmax_id;
00221     double cmin, cmax;
00222     int numTense, numCompress;
00223     double series_smax;
00224 
00225     // print mesh name
00226     printf("\n");
00227     printf("Mesh %d: '%s'\n", i, mesh_names[i]);
00228     fflush(NULL);
00229 
00230 
00231     //make complete vars first inorder to get min max for normalization
00232     for (j = 0; j < numStep; j++) {
00233       FC_Variable sigs[6];
00234       double currmax;
00235 
00236       for (k = 0; k < 6; k++)
00237      sigs[k] = sigmas[k][i][j];
00238       
00239       // get stress & pressure
00240       rc = fc_createStressPressureVariables(sigs, &stress[j], &pressure[j]);
00241       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "failed to compute stress & pressure");
00242       rc = fc_getVariableMinMax (stress[j], NULL, NULL, &currmax, NULL);
00243       if (j == 0){
00244      series_smax = currmax;
00245       } else {
00246      if (currmax >  series_smax){
00247        series_smax = currmax;
00248      }
00249       }
00250     }
00251 
00252  
00253     for (j = 0; j < numStep; j++) {
00254       printf("  Step %d:\n", j);
00255 
00256       // get compressions & tension subsets
00257       rc = fc_createThresholdSubset(pressure[j], "<", 0, "compression elems", 
00258                         &compress);
00259       fc_getSubsetNumMember(compress, &numCompress);
00260       rc = fc_createThresholdSubset(pressure[j], ">", 0, "tension elems", 
00261                         &tense);
00262       fc_getSubsetNumMember(tense, &numTense);
00263       
00264       // get stats
00265       if (numTense == 0) {
00266      printf("    No tension elements\n");
00267       }
00268       else {
00269      fc_getVariableSubsetMinMax(stress[j], tense, &tmin, &tmin_id, 
00270                        &tmax, &tmax_id);
00271      printf("    Min_tension normalized_to_mesh_max_stress:     %9.6g %9.6g at ID %d\n", tmin, tmin/series_smax, tmin_id);
00272      printf("    Max_tension normalized_to_mesh_max_stress:     %9.6g %9.6g at ID %d\n", tmax, tmax/series_smax, tmax_id);
00273 
00274      // save extremes for summary
00275      if (firstt) {
00276        min_tmin = tmin;
00277        tminMeshID = i;
00278        tminStepID = j;
00279        max_tmax = tmax;
00280        tmaxMeshID = i;
00281        tmaxStepID = j;
00282        firstt = 0;
00283      }
00284      else {
00285        if (tmin < min_tmin) {
00286          min_tmin = tmin;
00287          tminMeshID = i;
00288          tminStepID = j;
00289        }
00290        if (tmax > max_tmax) {
00291          max_tmax = tmax;
00292          tmaxMeshID = i;
00293          tmaxStepID = j;
00294        }
00295      }
00296       } 
00297       
00298       if (numCompress == 0) {
00299      printf("    No compression elements\n");
00300       } 
00301       else {
00302      fc_getVariableSubsetMinMax(stress[j], compress, &cmin, &cmin_id, 
00303                        &cmax, &cmax_id);
00304      printf("    Min_compression normalized_to_mesh_max_stress: %9.6g %9.6g at ID %d\n", cmin, cmin/series_smax, cmin_id);
00305      printf("    Max_compression normalized_to_mesh_max_stress: %9.6g %9.6g at ID %d\n", cmax, cmax/series_smax, cmax_id);
00306      // save extremes for summary
00307      if (firstc) {
00308        min_cmin = cmin;
00309        cminMeshID = i;
00310        cminStepID = j;
00311        max_cmax = cmax;
00312        cmaxMeshID = i;
00313        cmaxStepID = j;
00314        firstc = 0;
00315      }
00316      else {
00317        if (cmin < min_cmin) {
00318          min_cmin = cmin;
00319          cminMeshID = i;
00320          cminStepID = j;
00321        }
00322        if (cmax > max_cmax) {
00323          max_cmax = cmax;
00324          cmaxMeshID = i;
00325          cmaxStepID = j;
00326        }
00327      }
00328       }
00329     }
00330 
00331     // for debugging
00332     /*
00333     // convert variables to seq variables so we can see in output
00334     rc = fc_convertVariablesToSeqVariable(numStep, stress, sequence, NULL,
00335                            &temp_seqVar);
00336     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to conver variables to seqVar");
00337     free(temp_seqVar);
00338     rc = fc_convertVariablesToSeqVariable(numStep, pressure, sequence, NULL,
00339                            &temp_seqVar);
00340     fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to conver variables to seqVar");
00341     free(temp_seqVar);
00342     */
00343 
00344     // cleanup
00345     fc_deleteMesh(meshes[i]);
00346   }
00347 
00348   // Summary
00349   if (numMesh > 1) {
00350 
00351     printf("\n");
00352     printf("Summary:\n");
00353 
00354     if (firstt) {
00355       printf("  No tensioned elements found\n");
00356     }
00357     else {
00358       printf("  Min tension:     %g at step %d on mesh %d:'%s'\n", 
00359           min_tmin, tminStepID, tminMeshID, mesh_names[tminMeshID]);
00360       printf("  Max tension:     %g at step %d on mesh %d:'%s'\n", 
00361           max_tmax, tmaxStepID, tmaxMeshID, mesh_names[tmaxMeshID]);
00362     }
00363     if (firstc) {
00364       printf("  No compressed elements found\n");
00365     }
00366     else {
00367       printf("  Min compression: %g at step %d on mesh %d:'%s'\n", 
00368           min_cmin, cminStepID, cminMeshID, mesh_names[cminMeshID]);
00369       printf("  Max compression: %g at step %d on mesh %d:'%s'\n", 
00370           max_cmax, cmaxStepID, cmaxMeshID, mesh_names[cmaxMeshID]);
00371     }
00372   }
00373 
00374   // for debuggin
00375   // write new dataset with new data
00376   //fc_rewriteDataset(ds, "maxStress.ex2", FC_FT_EXODUS);
00377 
00378   // shut down
00379   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++)
00380     free(mesh_names[i]);
00381   free(mesh_names);
00382   for (i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
00383     for (j = 0; j < numMesh; j++)
00384       free(sigmas[i][j]);
00385     free(sigmas[i]);
00386   }
00387   fc_deleteDataset(ds);
00388   fc_finalLibrary();
00389 
00390   exit(0);
00391 }
